title: GE Object Validation
description: Validation schema for GE objects. A GE at Cal Poly is a general education requirement that certain students must fulfill in order to graduate.

_id.description: the unique identifier for the GE object

term_id.description: the term id associated with the GE

name.description: the GE's friendly name (ex. 'GEC2 (C1 or C2 pre-2020 GE)')

courses.description: an array of course ids for courses that fulfill the GE

url.description: the url to the GE's page (useful for end users)
